snippet: The Richard Tucker Music Foundation said on Sunday that it had increased the size of the cash prize given to the winner of the annual Richard Tucker Award to $50,000 from $30,000.
abstract: Richard Tucker Music Foundation announces that it has increased size of cash prize given to winner of annual Richard Tucker Award to $50,000 from $30,000; award goes to singer considered on verge of major international career.
lead_paragraph: The Richard Tucker Music Foundation said on Sunday that it had increased the size of the cash prize given to the winner of the annual Richard Tucker Award to $50,000 from $30,000.
